profileAlternative.name: Stuart Disney
profileAlternative.headline: Database Administrator for SQL Server and Oracle

positions.title: Database Administrator - Oracle and SQL Server
positions.description:
Database Administration for SQL Server (2000, 2005, 2008 and 2012) databases and Oracle 10g and 11g databases.
Additional support for installing and supporting in-house software developments and 3rd party software.

positions.title: Database Administrator - Oracle and Teradata on UNIX platforms
Database Administrator - DB2 on Mainframe, Oracle and Teradata on UNIX

educations.title: University of the West of England

given.text:
Stuart is an enthusiastic and extremely capable database administrator. The work he has completed includes moving systems from Oracle (his original skill set was based in Oracle) to SQL Server (where he has quickly developed a comprehensive skillset). It is testament to his abilities that systems are fully available and robust in implementation. Stuart is on a personal level and extremely likeable individual who can work on his own, setting accurate deadlines but also as a valued team member.
…
See more

received.text: Karl has been an approachable manager who is always enthusiastic to take on new ideas and projects and ensure the means are inplace to implement them.

Ravi was an excellent Oracle DBA who joined the team to take sole responsibility for the management of Oracle Database/systems and train other team members. He integrated well within the team and was able to undertake support for other database systems very quickly. As the size and number of Oracle databases/systems grew Ravi was a major contributor in the strategic management of those systems.

peopleAlsoViewed.text: Head Chef at DoubleTree by Hilton

Conference and banqueting operations manager at Eastwood Hall Nottingham
